questions.question: What is the main goal of the 2030 Saudi Vision?
questions.correct_answer: To transform Saudi Arabia into a thriving and sustainable economy by 2030.
choices: To improve quality of life for citizens
To transform Saudi Arabia into a thriving and sustainable economy by 2030.

questions.question: Which sector does the 2030 Saudi Vision prioritize for growth?
What is the target set by the 2030 Saudi Vision for female participation in the workforce?
The private sector will play no role in achieving the goals of the 2030 Saudi Vision
The 2030 Saudi Vision aims to reduce the kingdom's dependence on oil exports.
How much of Saudi Arabia's electricity is expected to come from renewable sources by 2030 according to the vision?
